title: Can't redeem codes
body: I got codes for Dreadknight Garen  but I always get an error when redeeming. "There was a problem fullfilling your store items, please try again..."

replies.body: No worries fam, da poros got you. Be sure to double check your collection the next time you login and let me know if it didn't go through!
Same problem! Can you give me some help?

You could submit a ticket and request the skins, and they'll help you out there. Or you can wait here for a poro to come back, and they'll add it to your account too. You should also take a look at Unchained Alistar and Riot Girl Tristana while you're at it! Those skins are free too, so if you decide you want either or both of them, you could also request those.
